ChromaMate

utility v1.0.0

About ChromaMate

ChromaMate is a fast and intuitive color picker for iOS designers, photographers, and artists. Capture colors from your camera, edit them manually, and organize your favorite colors—completely free to use.

Key Features

Camera Color Picker

  • Real-time RGB and HEX color detection
  • Tap anywhere to capture colors from your camera
  • Magnifying lens for accurate picking
  • Smart lighting detection

Manual Color Editor

  • RGB, HSL, HSV, and HEX sliders
  • Direct code input and editing
  • Color wheel for intuitive selection
  • CMYK and LAB color space support

Smart Features

  • Copy to clipboard in multiple formats (HEX, RGB, HSL, HSV, CMYK, LAB)
  • Automatic color name recognition (HTML Named Colors database)
  • Universal search by color code or name
  • Dark mode support
  • Works completely offline - no internet required

Core Features - All Free

  • Color palette creation and organization
  • Unlimited saved colors
  • Export colors in multiple formats
  • Color naming and search
  • Offline support

Future Enhancements We may introduce optional premium features in the future, but all core functionality will remain free.

Why Choose ChromoMate?

  • ✅ Completely Free - No ads, no subscriptions, no cost
  • ✅ Simple and Fast - Intuitive interface, instant launch
  • ✅ Privacy First - Works offline, no data collection
  • ✅ Offline Support - Works anywhere, no internet needed
  • ✅ Designer Friendly - Built for designers, photographers, and artists
  • ✅ Open to Growth - Core features free, with flexibility for future enhancements

Perfect For

  • Professional graphic designers
  • UI/UX designers and developers
  • Photographers and photo editors
  • Interior decorators
  • Artists and illustrators
  • DIY and craft enthusiasts

Support

For questions or feature requests, email us at contact@borysonline.com. We’re constantly improving ChromaMate based on user feedback.
